thread.title: Anna-Lena Friedsam books date with Anastasia Pavlyuchenkova in Linz final
thread.title_full: Anna-Lena Friedsam books date with Anastasia Pavlyuchenkova in Linz final

title: Anna-Lena Friedsam books date with Anastasia Pavlyuchenkova in Linz final
text:
Anna-Lena Friedsam books date with Anastasia Pavlyuchenkova in Linz final 17 Oct 2015 18:02:01 
Anna-Lena Friedsam will contest her first WTA final following victory over Johanna Larsson in the Generali Ladies at Linz. 
Friedsam, 21, will face Anastasia Pavlyuchenkova in the showpiece after both came through three-set semi-finals. 
German Friedsam defeated world number 59 Larsson 6-4 4-6 7-5, taking two hours and seven minutes over victory. 
She saved six break points from 10 and converted five out of eight on Larsson's serve and will now be looking for a first win on tour. 
Seventh seed Pavlyuchenkova stands in her way, aiming for her eighth career title. 
The last seed standing was a 6-3 3-6 6-2 winner over Kirsten Flipkens. 
Pavlyuchenkova was 6-3 3-0 up until her opponent stitched together seven straight games to force a deciding set. 
Friedsam and Pavlyuchenkova will now meet for the first time in the final. Related Sport News
